name: Artifact: Blade of the First Pact
effect: Turns one battlefield decision into a legend (or a catastrophe).
drawback: Its presence corrupts local wildlife over weeks.

name: Artifact: Mirror of the Golden Judge
effect: Rewrites the owner’s face in the memories of those who knew them.
drawback: It cannot be hidden; whispers spread regardless of secrecy.

name: Artifact: Bell of the Last Titan
effect: Rewrites the owner’s face in the memories of those who knew them.
drawback: Its presence corrupts local wildlife over weeks.

name: Artifact: Mask of the Seven Gates
effect: Turns one battlefield decision into a legend (or a catastrophe).
drawback: Every use draws the attention of an ancient claimant.

name: Artifact: Key of the Last Titan
effect: Alters the course of a kingdom when used in public ritual.
drawback: Its presence corrupts local wildlife over weeks.

name: Artifact: Blade of the Silent Choir
effect: Holds a binding clause that can compel an oathbreaker.
drawback: Every use draws the attention of an ancient claimant.

name: Artifact: Seal of the Fallen Star
effect: Alters the course of a kingdom when used in public ritual.
drawback: It cannot be hidden; whispers spread regardless of secrecy.

effect: Rewrites the owner’s face in the memories of those who knew them.
drawback: It demands a sacrifice of something precious each season.
